EmailTemplate.name: Intro to your new MBO contact creating estimate (1342121790.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Intro to your new MBO contact creating estimate (1342121790.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Michael, My name is Sara Conde and I received your contact information from Steve Arhancet. From this point on I’ll be your main point of contact at MBO. Steve has brought me up to speed on your background and I like to create and walk you through a financial illustation of the MBO program. To set up a time to chat you may go here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to workign with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
